movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Paul King
Written by: Paul King, Hamish McColl
Starring by: Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Julie Walters
Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Story start with An explorer named Montgomery Clyde documents his trip to Darkest Peru. He comes across a rather intelligent species of bears. Although he tries to take one in, he decides to bond with them and learns that they can talk and have a great appetite for marmalade. Clyde says he’s learned a lot from the bears, and he wonders if the bears have learned anything from him.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Radha Mohan
Starring by: Tanya Ravichandran, Arulnithi Stalin, Vivek
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie story about touching upon human values with light hearted humor. The importance of family the enduring bond of brotherhood and the power of forgiveness will surely make you smile. Arulnidhi steals the show with his subtle performance and once again proves that he has a great eye for picking quality content. This film is an exhilarating feel-good entertainer.

movieInfo:
Directed by: S. S. Surya
Starring by: Nikki Galrani, Vikram Prabhu, Bindhu Madhavi
Genres: Action, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Film start with Nadiya tries to kill herself when she is separated from Pandu her lover. However, when a lookalike of Pandu, Dhoni Kumar saves her, she is shocked to learn that he is not the man she loves. Nikki Galrani portrayed a Rajinikanth fan.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Ritesh Rana
Starring by: Sri Simha Koduri, Athulya Chandra, Naresh Agastya
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie story start with Babu Mohan is a courier boy by profession. Upset by his poor life he decides to cheat his customers and make money. He targets a special apartment for his loot and right when he manages to rob a lady, she dies on the stop.

movieInfo:
Directed by: G.R. Krishna
Written by: Abburi Ravi, G.R. Krishna
Starring by: Shalini Pandey, Raj Tarun, Master Bharath
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie story about a series of coincidences brings two star crossed lovers together but fate pulls them apart until they encounter each other again in Hyderabad. Mahi and Varsha are childhood friends who meet after 25 years. Very soon they get close and start liking each other. The couple decides to propose to each other but because of a health scare featuring Mahi, things fall apart all of a sudden.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Shankar Bhanu
Starring by: Tejas Kancherla, Payal Rajput, Naresh, Aamani
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie is all about a girl named Alivelu who promotes government welfare schemes just to get an appointment with the chief minister of the state. For this, she uses the hero and gets a meeting arranged with the CM.

movieInfo:
Directed by: B. Jeevan Reddy
Starring by: Muskaan Khubchandani, Sandeep Madhav, Satya Dev
Genres: Biography, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie story about the Osmania University for his higher studies. There he comes across many problems that the students are facing. He keeps quiet for a while but revolts after a particular incident. Seeing his courage, many in the campus support him and very soon, George becomes a hero. He starts fighting for the rights of the students and in all this, develops a lot of enemies.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kenny Ortega
Written by: Sara Parriott, Josann McGibbon
Starring by: Cameron Boyce, Dove Cameron, Sofia Carson
Genres: Adventure, Family, Musical
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The teenagers of Disney’s most infamous villains return to the Isle of the Lost to recruit a new batch of villainous offspring to join them at Auradon Prep.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Upputuri Mahesh
Starring by: Siva Balaji, Rajiv Kanakala, Sushuma Yarlagadda
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie story about two close friends Chalapathi and Mohan. When everything seems to be going well in their life, a small miscommunication leads to a major disturbance among the friends. Siva Balaji is also very good in his role as a daring and kind-hearted person. His screen presence and performance bring depth to the proceedings to an extent.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: K.S. Ravikumar
Starring by: Balakrishna, Sonal Chauhan, Vedhika
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Film story start with Arjun Prasad is a famous IT magnet who is brought by Sarojini Prasad. He decides to start a new branch for his prestigious company in the state of Uttar Pradesh. One fine day he comes to know that his mother Sarojini Devi faces massive insult because of some evil politicians. To make things correct Arjun Prasad comes to Uttar Pradesh but to his shock everyone starts calling him Dharma a ferocious cop.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Kalyaan
Starring by: Yogi Babu, Jyothika, Revathy, Samuthirakani
Genres: Action, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie start with Jyotika whose character is presented like that of a mass hero in many scenes, easily fits into the role, while Revathy is equally convincing. The two of them appear in stylish costumes, dance for that mandatory intro song for mass heroes, utters punch lines and pull off some fight scenes, too.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Maruthi Dasari
Starring by: Sai Dharam Tej, Raashi Khanna, Sathyaraj
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Film start with Satyaraj is old man who is diagnosed with lung cancer and is in his last stage of life. He informs this to his family and his grandson Sai takes lead and comes down to India and promises Satyaraj that he will make him spend the last few days with his family in peace. But Satyaraj’s sons have no time for their dad and reluctantly come to India.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Jeethu Joseph
Written by: Renzil D’Silva, Sameer Arora
Starring by: Karthi, Jyothika, Nikhila Vimal, Sathyaraj
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Story about Parvathy hopes her aggressive younger brother Saravanan would return home. Her politician father Gnanamoorthy, mother and grand mother too believe that the miracle may happen one day. But fate had other plans. Moorthy identifies Vicky a trickster and a tourist guide in Goa to be his son lost son and brings him home.

movieInfo:
Directed by: George Nolfi
Written by: Stephen J. Rivele, Christopher Wilkinson
Starring by: Billy Magnussen, Yu Xia, Philip Ng
Genres: Action, Biography, Drama
Country: China, USA
Language: English
movieDescription: Film start in 1964 a young Bruce Lee owns and operates a San Francisco Kung Fu Academy specializing in the Chinese martial art Wing Chun. Lee cares for his students providing advice roles as extras in his upcoming projects, and defending them from the gangs of Chinatown. One of Lee’s students, Steve McKee, spars with Lee while fighting in anger, causing Lee to counter and embarrass him.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Aaron Mirtes
Written by: Brad Belemjian, Aaron Mirtes
Starring by: Burt Culver, Brittany Belland, Madeleine Hei
Genres: Crime, Horror, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Movie start with Emma a college student with a crippling fear of clowns must come face to face with her worst fear when an evil spirit in the body of a clown is summoned terrorizing the town she calls home.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Nizam Razak
Written by: Anas Abdul Aziz, Nizam Razak
Starring by: Nur Sarah Alisya, Anas Abdul Aziz, Mohd Fathi Diaz
Genres: Animation, Action, Comedy, Sci-Fi
Country: Malaysia
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A group of alien treasure hunters named The Tengkotak has arrived on earth and kidnapped Ochobot in order to use him to locate an ancient and powerful Power Sphere hiding on earth. BoBoiBoy and his super friends must now race against time to save Ochobot and uncover the secrets behind the Sfera Kuasa. Their journey will take them on an adventure filled with action, comedy, and beautiful locales.
